sentences.en: Be a hero in the strife!
sentences.cn: 要在战斗中当一名闯将!

sentences.en: Beset by ethnic strife, the province remains ungovernable.
sentences.cn: 该省因受种族冲突困扰而失控。

sentences.en: It was more than ever a living strife between him and Mary.
sentences.cn: 他和玛丽之间的竞争比以前更加激烈了.

sentences.en: It would involve all Rome in a fearful strife.
sentences.cn: 这将使整个罗马卷入一场可怕的战争.

sentences.en: Money is a major cause of strife in many marriages.
sentences.cn: 钱在许多婚姻中是导致冲突的一个主要原因。

sentences.en: She was faint with strife and dejected.
sentences.cn: 她被争吵弄得精疲力竭,情绪低落.

sentences.en: Short greeting serves in time of strife.
Strife was internecine during the next fortnight.
sentences.cn: 在以后两个星期的冲突中我们两败俱伤.

sentences.en: The forces of unreason destroy one another in futile strife.
sentences.cn: 而那些非理性的力量则在无益的倾轧中互相毁灭.

sentences.en: The internecine strife was caused by a shortage of food.
sentences.cn: 这次内部冲突，是由于食物匮乏而引致的。

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

sentences.en: The strife , however, was by no means ended.
The worst of the strife was over.
We do not intend to be drawn into the internal strife.
sentences.cn: 我们不想卷入内乱之中.

sentences.en: What is the major cause of the labour - management strife?
sentences.cn: 劳资冲突的主要原因是什么?

sentences.en: What's the use of this endless strife? he wondered.
sentences.cn: 他想,这样不断地跟长辈冲突有什么好处 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: trouble between two or more people or groups
